page.title: 15ANIMALS AND INSECTS
page.content: We went to the Naze to look for animals and insects.There were more insects lurking than animals although we saw a rabbit or two.We were amazed to find a Wolf Spider sitting on her egg sac.There were two different species of butterflies,a small skipper butterfly and a cabbage white.There were two flies,a blue bottle and a hoverfly.There was lots of cuckoo spit on the tips of blades of grass and we actually saw a young and an adult froghopper.We also saw the usual common insects,woodlice,beetles,ants, gnats.
